keywords: ['bagpipe music', 'solo', 'no other instruments', 'folk music', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'traditional scottish music']
caption: This song features an instrumental played on bagpipes. One pedal note is played continuously on the lower register while the higher notes are played to a melody. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song. This song can be played at a Scottish fair.
